Format.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item and adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.

Break.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.

Delimit.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.

GetBreak.summary: Adds a newline if line length is greater than CharLength.
GetBreak.param: returns true if new line; otherwise false.

GetDelimit.summary: Adds a delimiter if not the first list item.
